description: '''Ghalia Vauthier''', known professionally as '''Ghalia Volt''', is a Belgian [[blues rock]] singer, guitarist, drummer and songwriter. She has been involved in the release of five albums since 2016, including ''Mississippi Blend'' (2019) released on [[Ruf Records]]. It peaked at number three on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Billboard charts|Top Blues Albums Chart]].
